alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Kendall; Kerr; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 05 at 3:49AM CDT until October 05 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Kerr County in south central Texas... Gillespie County in south central Texas... Southwestern Llano County in south central Texas... Northwestern Kendall County in south central Texas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 349 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Doss, or 14 miles northwest of Fredericksburg, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kerrville, Fredericksburg, Ingram, Stonewall, Tivydale, Rocky Hill, Waltonia, Blumenthal, Albert, Crabapple, Grapetown, Oxford, Cherry Spring, Enchanted Rock State Natural Area, Luckenbach, Cain City, Old Tunnel State Park, Doss, Willow City, and LBJ State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
